name: Counter Worlds
description:
Can you feel it?

Nothing's been the same since the Fissure.

The unity of body and soul was broken, opening a dark void issuing forth calamities — free radicals wreaking havoc on both realms. Careful how you move, they can sense it somehow...

Only by traversing the rift can we regain what was lost. Use the gems you collect wisely: soul gems allow instant passage between worlds, and body gems restore your life. But both will be needed to reconnect the realms and bring harmony once more.

Controls
Walk: Left & Right Arrow Keys
Jump: Up Arrow Key
Switch Worlds (costs one blue soul gem): Space Bar

Objective
Activate both the blue and red bridges between realms by collecting at least 2 gems of the bridge's color.

Disclaimer: This version is a rough prototype for functional testing. Feedback is welcome!
